name: **Passage East**
description: Passage East S704-102 Sheet 76 Passage is a beautiful village, well worth a waystop any time one passes. Admire the architecture and the surroundings, and the peace, between arriving ferries. A severe one way system governs the town traffic in that context. The pubs and restaurants are absolutely lovely. Kayaks will land on the S side of the harbour on a sheltered gravel beach. Recommended stop for any visitor to the area. Across Waterford Harbour lies the beautiful fishing and tourist village of Dunmore
